name: weblate-chrome-extension
description: A Chrome extension for in-context editing of Weblate translations

scripts.build: npm run validate && echo Extension ready for packaging
scripts.test: npm run validate && echo All tests passed
scripts.package: echo Creating extension package... && powershell Compress-Archive -Path *.js,*.json,*.html,*.css,icons -DestinationPath weblate-extension.zip -Force && echo Package created: weblate-extension.zip

author: Weblate Extension Developer
